005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.xml; // NOPMD
007
008import com.ctc.wstx.stax.WstxOutputFactory;
009
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IConfiguration;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupMultiline;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IAssemblyDefinition;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.AutoCloser;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.AbstractSchemaGenerator;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.SchemaGenerationException;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.SchemaGenerationFeature;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.xml.datatype.XmlDatatypeManager;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.xml.impl.XmlGenerationState;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.schemagen.xml.schematype.IXmlType;
022
023import net.sf.saxon.s9api.Processor;
024import net.sf.saxon.s9api.SaxonApiException;
025import net.sf.saxon.s9api.Serializer;
026import net.sf.saxon.s9api.Xslt30Transformer;
027import net.sf.saxon.s9api.XsltCompiler;
028import net.sf.saxon.s9api.XsltExecutable;
029
030import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLOutputFactory2;
031import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLStreamWriter2;
032
033import java.io.IOException;
034import java.io.InputStream;
035import java.io.StringReader;
036import java.io.StringWriter;
037import java.io.Writer;
038import java.util.HashMap;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.Map;
041
042import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
043import javax.xml.stream.XMLOutputFactory;
044import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
045import javax.xml.transform.stream.StreamSource;
046
047import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
048import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
049
050public class XmlSchemaGenerator
051    extends AbstractSchemaGenerator<
052        AutoCloser<XMLStreamWriter2, SchemaGenerationException>,
053        XmlDatatypeManager,
054        XmlGenerationState> {
055  // private static final Logger LOGGER =
056  // LogManager.getLogger(XmlSchemaGenerator.class);
057
058  @NonNull
059  public static final String PREFIX_XML_SCHEMA = "xs";
060  @NonNull
061  public static final String NS_XML_SCHEMA = "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema";
062  @NonNull
063  private static final String PREFIX_XML_SCHEMA_VERSIONING = "vs";
064  @NonNull
065  private static final String NS_XML_SCHEMA_VERSIONING = "http://www.w3.org/2007/XMLSchema-versioning";
066  @NonNull
067  public static final String NS_XHTML = "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml";
068
069  @NonNull
070  private final XMLOutputFactory2 xmlOutputFactory;
071
072  @NonNull
073  private static XMLOutputFactory2 defaultXMLOutputFactory() {
074    XMLOutputFactory2 xmlOutputFactory = (XMLOutputFactory2) XMLOutputFactory.newInstance();
075    assert xmlOutputFactory instanceof WstxOutputFactory;
076    xmlOutputFactory.configureForSpeed();
077    xmlOutputFactory.setProperty(XMLOutputFactory.IS_REPAIRING_NAMESPACES, true);
078    return xmlOutputFactory;
079  }
080
081  public XmlSchemaGenerator() {
082    this(defaultXMLOutputFactory());
083  }
084
085  @SuppressFBWarnings("EI_EXPOSE_REP2")
086  public XmlSchemaGenerator(@NonNull XMLOutputFactory2 xmlOutputFactory) {
087    this.xmlOutputFactory = xmlOutputFactory;
088  }
089
090  protected XMLOutputFactory2 getXmlOutputFactory() {
091    return xmlOutputFactory;
092  }
093
094  @Override
095  protected AutoCloser<XMLStreamWriter2, SchemaGenerationException> newWriter(
096      Writer out) {
097    XMLStreamWriter2 writer;
098    try {
099      writer = ObjectUtils.notNull((XMLStreamWriter2) getXmlOutputFactory().createXMLStreamWriter(out));
100    } catch (XMLStreamException ex) {
101      throw new SchemaGenerationException(ex);
102    }
103    return AutoCloser.autoClose(writer, t -> {
104      try {
105        t.close();
106      } catch (XMLStreamException ex) {
107        throw new SchemaGenerationException(ex);
108      }
109    });
110  }
111
112  @Override
113  protected XmlGenerationState newGenerationState(
114      IModule module,
115      AutoCloser<XMLStreamWriter2, SchemaGenerationException> schemaWriter,
116      IConfiguration<SchemaGenerationFeature<?>> configuration) {
117    return new XmlGenerationState(module, schemaWriter, configuration);
118  }
119
120  @Override
121  public void generateFromModule(
122      @NonNull IModule module,
123      @NonNull Writer out,
124      @NonNull IConfiguration<SchemaGenerationFeature<?>> configuration) {
125    try (StringWriter stringWriter = new StringWriter()) {
126      super.generateFromModule(module, stringWriter, configuration);
127      stringWriter.flush();
128
129      try (StringReader stringReader = new StringReader(stringWriter.toString())) {
130        Processor processor = new Processor(false);
131        XsltCompiler compiler = processor.newXsltCompiler();
132        try (InputStream is = getClass().getResourceAsStream("/identity.xsl")) {
133          XsltExecutable stylesheet = compiler.compile(new StreamSource(is));
134          Xslt30Transformer transformer = stylesheet.load30();
135          Serializer serializer = processor.newSerializer(out);
136          StreamSource source = new StreamSource(stringReader);
137          transformer.transform(source, serializer);
138        }
139      }
140    } catch (IOException | SaxonApiException ex) {
141      throw new SchemaGenerationException(ex);
142    }
143  }
144
145  @Override
146  protected void generateSchema(XmlGenerationState state) {
147
148    try {
149      String targetNS = state.getDefaultNS();
150
151      // analyze all definitions
152      Map<String, String> prefixToNamespaceMap = new HashMap<>(); // NOPMD concurrency not needed
153      final List<IAssemblyDefinition> rootAssemblyDefinitions = analyzeDefinitions(
154          state,
155          (entry, definition) -> {
156            assert entry != null;
157            assert definition != null;
158            IXmlType type = state.getXmlForDefinition(definition);
159            if (!entry.isInline()) {
160              QName qname = type.getQName();
161              String namespace = qname.getNamespaceURI();
162              if (!targetNS.equals(namespace)) {
163                // collect namespaces and prefixes for definitions with a different namespace
164                prefixToNamespaceMap.computeIfAbsent(qname.getPrefix(), x -> namespace);
165              }
166            }
167          });
168
169      // write some root elements
170      XMLStreamWriter2 writer = state.getXMLStreamWriter();
171      writer.writeStartDocument("UTF-8", "1.0");
172      writer.writeStartElement(PREFIX_XML_SCHEMA, "schema", NS_XML_SCHEMA);
173      writer.writeDefaultNamespace(targetNS);
174      writer.writeNamespace(PREFIX_XML_SCHEMA_VERSIONING, NS_XML_SCHEMA_VERSIONING);
175
176      // write namespaces for all indexed definitions
177      for (Map.Entry<String, String> entry : prefixToNamespaceMap.entrySet()) {
178        state.writeNamespace(entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
179      }
180
181      IModule module = state.getModule();
182
183      // write remaining root attributes
184      writer.writeAttribute("targetNamespace", targetNS);
185      writer.writeAttribute("elementFormDefault", "qualified");
186      writer.writeAttribute(NS_XML_SCHEMA_VERSIONING, "minVersion", "1.0");
187      writer.writeAttribute(NS_XML_SCHEMA_VERSIONING, "maxVersion", "1.1");
188      writer.writeAttribute("version", module.getVersion());
189
190      generateSchemaMetadata(module, state);
191
192      for (IAssemblyDefinition definition : rootAssemblyDefinitions) {
193        QName xmlQName = definition.getRootXmlQName();
194        if (xmlQName != null
195            && (xmlQName.getNamespaceURI() == null || state.getDefaultNS().equals(xmlQName.getNamespaceURI()))) {
196          generateRootElement(definition, state);
197        }
198      }
199
200      state.generateXmlTypes();
201
202      writer.writeEndElement(); // xs:schema
203      writer.writeEndDocument();
204      writer.flush();
205    } catch (XMLStreamException ex) {
206      throw new SchemaGenerationException(ex);
207    }
208  }
209
210  protected static void generateSchemaMetadata(
211      @NonNull IModule module,
212      @NonNull XmlGenerationState state)
213      throws XMLStreamException {
214    String targetNS = ObjectUtils.notNull(module.getXmlNamespace().toASCIIString());
215    state.writeStartElement(PREFIX_XML_SCHEMA, "annotation", NS_XML_SCHEMA);
216    state.writeStartElement(PREFIX_XML_SCHEMA, "appinfo", NS_XML_SCHEMA);
217
218    state.writeStartElement(targetNS, "schema-name");
219
220    module.getName().writeXHtml(targetNS, state.getXMLStreamWriter());
221
222    state.writeEndElement();
223
224    state.writeStartElement(targetNS, "schema-version");
225    state.writeCharacters(module.getVersion());
226    state.writeEndElement();
227
228    state.writeStartElement(targetNS, "short-name");
229    state.writeCharacters(module.getShortName());
230    state.writeEndElement();
231
232    state.writeEndElement();
233
234    MarkupMultiline remarks = module.getRemarks();
235    if (remarks != null) {
236      state.writeStartElement(PREFIX_XML_SCHEMA, "documentation", NS_XML_SCHEMA);
237
238      remarks.writeXHtml(targetNS, state.getXMLStreamWriter());
239      state.writeEndElement();
240    }
241
242    state.writeEndElement();
243  }
244
245  private static void generateRootElement(@NonNull IAssemblyDefinition definition, @NonNull XmlGenerationState state)
246      throws XMLStreamException {
247    assert definition.isRoot();
248
249    XMLStreamWriter2 writer = state.getXMLStreamWriter();
250    QName xmlQName = definition.getRootXmlQName();
251
252    writer.writeStartElement(PREFIX_XML_SCHEMA, "element", NS_XML_SCHEMA);
253    writer.writeAttribute("name", xmlQName.getLocalPart());
254    writer.writeAttribute("type", state.getXmlForDefinition(definition).getTypeReference());
255
256    writer.writeEndElement();
257  }
258}
